condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Relevant central and district Government agencies equipped to implement communication for development interventions for behaviour and social change

description.narrative: Behaviour and social change activities organized in tackling barriers on knowledge, attitudes and behaviours on priority areas - inclusive education, early child development, bullying and violence toward children. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:10/02/2020

title.narrative: Capacity development strategy under implementation to strengthen and institutionalize C4D skills of government, implementing partners staff at national level and subnational level meets quality standards

target.value: 2020:Level 2 - 50% - C4D capacity development is characterized by at least 2 of the listed quality standards (Planning and Institutionalization)

actual.value: 2019:Capacity needs assessment and draft C4D capacity development strategy is included in the new CPD 2021-2025.
